title: Taco Bell 7 with Lorne Balfe
itunes:title: Taco Bell 7 with Lorne Balfe
description:
Lorne Balfe (Mission: Impossible - Fallout, The Lego Batman Movie, The Tomorrow War) joins the 'boys and talks composing and London chains before a review of Taco Bell. Plus, a candy bar edition of Jingle All The Whey.

Commercials featured in the Jingle All The Whey segment:

Whatchamacallit

Almond Joy & Mounds "Sometimes You Feel Like a Nut"

Payday "Payday Is Almost Totally Nuts!"

Take 5

Caramello "Stretch it Out"

Sources for this week's intro:

https://www.catholic365.com/article/8819/pope-sabinian-the-despised-pope.html

https://www.tasteofhome.com/article/how-taco-bell-got-its-name/

https://www.grayflannelsuit.net/blog/logo-evolution-taco-bell#:~:text=1962%2D72,retains%20a%20decidedly%201950s%20aesthetic

https://www.tacobell.com/blog/demolition-man

https://www.tacobell.com/history

Want more Doughboys? Check out our Patreon!: https://patreon.com/doughboys

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
